title: PMs statement on Gearing up for the 3rd India Africa Forum Summit 2015 (Prime Minister’s ...
text: ( Source : Prime Minister’s Office of India) India is proud to host the 3rd India Africa Forum Summit from 26-29 October 2015 in New Delhi . This time the level of engagement has been scaled up significantly and we have invited Leaders from
